scenario_text.value:
It...it hurts. It feels like...I’m being
shaken from the inside.
It’s too much... I can’t stay on my feet.

This shaking... It feels like it’s directly
beneath us.

No, I sense traces of the Holy Beast’s
power. The shrine entrance must be nearby.

But...we’ve already searched everywhere!
Where’s left to look?

Well, if this is due to the power of
a Kemonogami, we should be able to find out.
You can use that <color=#B41919>device</color> of yours, Takuma.
